content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ get ready to brighten your day with the **gemstone hues crochet beanie** this simple and stylish beanie is worked from the bottom up starting with the brim the timeless granny stitch colorwork rounds create a delightful diamond pattern reminiscent of sparkling jewels and with six sizes it s perfect for everyone from little ones to adults ensuring that no one misses out on its cozy charm whether you re out for a winter stroll or cozying up with friends this beanie adds a splash of color and warmth to every adventure wear it with pride and let your inner gem shine bright perfect for crocheters of all levels this pattern comes with detailed instructions including a full video tutorial to guide you through each step crochet hook g 4 0mm & h 5 0mm 1 - or size to meet gauge notions removable stitch marker 2 yarn needle to weave in ends 3 scissors 4 pompom 5 if you want to make your faux fur pompom click **here** 6 yarn lion brand color theory 7 100% acrylic 246yds/100g yardage total yards color a / color b / color c / color d yds newborn 112 yds 83/5/10/14 baby 141 yds 105/6/12/18 toddler 175 yds 135/8/15/22 child/small adult 209 yds 158/9/17/25 adult 255 yds 192/11/20/32 large adult 292yds 220/24/12/36 yarn substitutions wecrochet swish 8 100% fine superwash merino wool 110yds/50g hobbii kind feather 9 100% premium acrylic 257 yds / 3 5oz mary maxim starlette worsted 10 100% ultra soft acrylic 180 yds/100g lion brand mandala ombre 11 100% acrylic 344yds/150g abbreviations blo - back loop only chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet flo - front loop only slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet st s - stitch es stsc - stacked single_crochet 12 gauge 15 sts x 9 row = 4 x4 in granny stitch with 5 0mm hook 22 sts x 22 row = 4 x4 in blo single_crochet with 4 0mm hook not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 13 sizes to fit head circumference newborn 13-14 33-36 cm baby 16-17 41-43 cm toddler 18-19 46-48 cm child/small adult 20-21 51-53 cm adult 22-23 56-58 cm large adult 24-25 61-64 cm skill level intermediate let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 14 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 15 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 16 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 17 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 18 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 19 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2024 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use
